amendment.description: Amendment provides that State and local education agencies are able to use multiple measures when identifying academic performance measurements instead of the current one-size-fits-all testing assessments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Reed.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
